title: Superfoods For Dummies by Brent Agin and Shereen Jegtvig [EPUB]
description:
Book name: Superfoods For Dummies
 
Book author: Brent Agin and Shereen Jegtvig
 
Book description: A practical guide to improving health with specific types of food Research shows a healthy diet incorporating a variety of "superfoods"--foods that are rich in antioxidants, high in fiber, and contain an abundance of vitamins and minerals--can help anyone maintain a healthy weight, fight disease, and live longer. Superfoods For Dummies provides readers with???the information they need to purchase, prepare, and incorporate these superfoods into their everyday diet--and avoid trips to the doctor. From antioxidant powerhouses like broccoli and blueberries to the fantastic flavonoids found in green and black tea, the book explains how superfoods help prevent disease, control weight, and increase energy. Readers will even discover more than 50 great recipes to help them incorporate these foods into everyday meals. Dr. Brent Agin, MD (Palm Harbor, FL), is owner of Precision Health Family Practice, Medical Director of Precision Weight Loss, and Medical Director of Precision Laser Day Spa in Palm Harbor, FL. A select group of his patients are A list celebrities and professional athletes who rely on Brent to counsel them on matters of health, fitness, and aging.
 
Number of pages: 360
 
ISBN13: 9780470445396
 
ISBN10: 0470445394
 
Format: EPUB
